lead_paragraph: Almost a third of credit card borrowers make payments at or near the monthly minimum amount, a new study shows, increasing the interest they pay.

headline.print_headline: Sticking With Minimum Due, Even if You Can Pay More
headline.main: The Persistence of the Minimum Payment
